Edinburgh or anywhere. Full-time engineers. Open source web stack/SaaS

FreeAgent (http://www.freeagent.com)

FreeAgent is a company born out of the frustration that accounting is just too damn hard for freelancers and small businesses. We run a SaaS product to empower people with the knowledge and means to make that easier, and let them do things their way.

But whatever we make is only as good as the people making it!

We're looking for talented web and operations engineers of all levels, from graduates to team leaders, to come and join us on our mission to democratise small business accounting. We like Ruby, elasticsearch, MySQL, RabbitMQ, Puppet and service-oriented architectures. We're based in Edinburgh but we have a growing team of engineers who are distributed across the UK and USA. If we sound like your kind of company, write to us at jobs@freeagent.com.
